Text: There is some problem with my broadband at the moment. I am at this time running a upload speed 0.18kbps/s and a download speed at 3.5kbps/s. As soon as my brodband capacity has recovered, I will start to seed again. I am so pleased if you could understand this, thank you for your understanding. I usually have a high seed speed. So I can tell you this: Wait 48 hours or so. Because It might be my brodband ISP (company) that have some trouble.
Problem solved. Never mind of my comment made yesterday.
